content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, and I am quite greedy, so I will try to get the highest price possible. Let's start the negotiation. What is your offer for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my principles do not allow me to overpay or support greedy behavior. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
